General.Name: Radiation Technology
General.Description: Radiation Technology, Inc. designs, manufactures, and sells antennas worldwide. The company offers LTE/4G/BTS, IoT/intelligent, automotive, RFID/health care, GPS/transportation, and wireless communication antennas, as well as semi-rigid and flexible RF cable assembly products, RF connectors, wire harness, microwave devices, and other products, as well as medical, computer, and network cables. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.
